level.heading: COUNSELING (INDIVIDUAL ON-SITE, INDIVIDUAL OFF-SITE AND GROUP) (ยง 29-5204)

level.text: Be provided in fifteen (15) minute units;
Be provided on-site or off-site, or in individual or group interventions;
Require pre-authorization from DMH for additional units of service after a client has received 160 units of service;

Be provided in a DMH-certified community mental health rehabilitation services agency, the client’s home or other community setting or a residential facility consisting of sixteen (16) beds or less; and
Meet all other requirements set forth in 22 DCMR ยง 3417.
Counseling services shall not be billed on the same day as a day services encounter.
Counseling services shall not be billed on the same day as intensive day treatment, community-based intervention or assertive community treatment.
